comment:
Mash Volumes not correct:
trike grains with 14.18 L of water at 79.3 °C.
Mash at 68 °C for 60 min.
Vorlauf and lauter 10.14 L in your first runnings.
Add -3.86 L of sparge water at 75.5 °C.
Vorlauf and lauter -3.86 L in your second runnings.
Your combined runnings should be 6.28 gal.
strike 5 gal
Sparge 1.5 gal
Vorlauf and lauter 1 gal
Mash Volume worked out at 5 + 1.5 + 1.5 +.5 leaving 6.3 gal to boil.
